item.title: Going Forward
item.description: There’s quite a lot to unpack here. This site release uses Quartz v3.3. I love the way the site currently is and I may keep using v3 going forward and modify it myself as I go

item.title: Note with disabled comments
item.description: This note should have comments disabled.

item.title: Why Use Quartz?
item.description: I wanted to use Quartz because I wanted a simple and elegant website where I can make my own website garden.

item.description: Continuing my work to make the site more functional and have everything come all together, this new release should fix issues with Giscus.
